author: gfukushima
content:
Quick question regarding the engine API methods `engine_getPayloadBodiesByRangeV1` and `engine_getPayloadBodiesByHashV1`
> Client software MUST support request sizes of at least 32 block hashes. The call MUST return -38004: Too large request error if the number of requested payload bodies is too large.

Is the too large number subjective to each EL client?

author: m.kalinin
content: The upper limit on the size is implementation dependent according to the way the spec puts it
